sqlMap.select: select distinct r.materialnumber as materialNumber, r.productgroup_rule_id as productGroupRuleId, r.productgroup_id as productGroupId, r.out_price as outPrice, r.channelprice as channelPrice, r.freecost as freeCost from crm.crm_tb_promotion_detail d left join crm.crm_tb_productgroup_rule r on d.productgroup_id=r.productgroup_id where d.promotion_id=#promoId# order by r.productgroup_rule_id asc
select vv.item_value itemValue,vv.item_name itemName from basis.basis_tb_dict vv where vv.item_state='U' and vv.dict_type_id in (493,494)
select d.promotiondetail_id as promotiondetailId from crm.crm_tb_promotion_detail d where d.promotion_id=#promoId#
select p.promotion_id,p.promotion_name, p.pend_date,p.pbegin_date,p.purchasebegindate,p.purchaseenddate from crm.crm_tb_promotion p where p.promotion_id=#promoId#

select decode(sum(decode(f.fee_amounttotal,'','0',f.fee_amounttotal)),'','0',sum(decode(f.fee_amounttotal,null,'0',f.fee_amounttotal))) as displayCost from crm.crm_tb_fee f where f.promotion_id=#promoId#
select l.warehousenumber as warehouseCode,l.locationnumber as locationCode from CRM.CRM_TB_WAREHOUSE_LOCATION l where l.status='1'
sqlMap.insert:
select crm.crm_sq_productstock.NEXTVAL as id from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_productstock ( id, werks, lgort, matnr, unit, stocknum, createuser, createdate, modifyuser, modifydate, stockkcjy, bigmg, bigme ) values (#id#,#werks#,#lgort#,#matnr#,#unit#,#stocknum#,#createuser#,sysdate,#modifyuser#,sysdate,#stocknum#,#bigmg#,#bigme#)

SELECT basis.basis_seq_customer.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into basis_tb_customerInfo (ID, customer_name,customer_code,country,district,sale_office,sales_org,global_account,address,state,currency_code,contact_name,tel,nielsenRemark,CUSTOMER_TYPE) values (#id#, #customer_name#,#customer_code#,#country#,#district#,#sale_office#,#sales_org#,#nielsen#,#address#,#state#,#currency_code#,#name1#,#tele1#,#nielsenRemark#,#customer_type#)
sqlMap.update: update basis_tb_customerInfo a set a.customer_name=#customer_name#,a.customer_code=#customer_code#,a.country=#country#,a.district=#district#,a.sale_office=#sale_office#,a.sales_org=#sales_org#,a.address=#address#,a.state=#state#,a.currency_code=#currency_code#, a.global_account=#nielsen#,a.contact_name=#name1#,a.tel=#tele1#,a.nielsenRemark=#nielsenRemark#,customer_type=#customer_type# where customer_code=#customer_code#
sqlMap.select: select count( t.id) from basis_tb_customerInfo t where customer_code=#customer_code#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT basis.BASIS_SEQ_CUS_RELATIONSHIP.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into BASIS_TB_CUS_RELATIONSHIP (id, customer_code,sales_org,distri_channel,product_group,partnerType,partner_num,partnerId,partnerName,salesId,nameFoemat,address) values (#id#, #customer_code#,#sales_org#,#distri_channel#,#product_group#,#partnerType#,#partner_num#,#partnerId#,#partnerName#,#salesId#,#nameFoemat#,#address#)
sqlMap.update:
update BASIS_TB_CUS_RELATIONSHIP a set a.customer_code=#customer_code#,a.sales_org=#sales_org#,a.distri_channel=#distri_channel#,a.product_group=#product_group#,a.partnerType=#partnerType#,a.partner_num=#partner_num#,a.partnerId=#partnerId#,a.partnerName=#partnerName#,a.salesId=#salesId#,a.nameFoemat=#nameFoemat#,address=#address# where 1=1
customer_code=#customer_code#
partnerType=#partnerType#
partnerId=#partnerId#
sqlMap.select:
select count( t.id) from BASIS_TB_CUS_RELATIONSHIP t , BASIS_TB_CUSTOMERINFO i where 1=1 and t.customer_code = i.customer_code
t.customer_code=#customer_code#
t.partnerType=#partnerType#
t.partnerId=#partnerId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT basis.basis_seq_productInfo.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into basis_tb_productInfo ( id, material_id, material_exp, material_type, MATERIAL_GROUPID, base_unit, sale_unit, state, isDeleted, moq, material_name, cost, factory, PQ, NUMERATOR, DENOMINATOR, isLocked, isOrderItem, isQuoteItem, isDRItem, sync_userId, sync_time) values ( #id#, #material_id#, #material_exp#, #material_type#, #remark#, #base_unit#, #sale_unit#, #state#, #isDeleted#, #moq#, #material_name#, #cost#, #factory#, #wm_Unit#, #numerator#, #denominator#, #isLocked#, 'N', 'N', 'N', #sync_userId#, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: update basis_tb_productInfo a set a.material_id=#material_id#,a.material_exp=#material_exp#,a.material_type=#material_type#, a.MATERIAL_GROUPID=#remark#,a.base_unit=#base_unit#,a.sale_unit=#sale_unit#, a.state=#state# , a.isDeleted=#isDeleted#,a.moq=#moq#,a.material_name=#material_name#, a.cost=#cost# ,a.factory=#factory#,a.PQ=#wm_Unit#,a.numerator=#numerator#,a.denominator=#denominator#,a.isLocked=#isLocked#, a.sync_time=sysdate, a.sync_userId=#sync_userId#, a.rfs_date = #rfs_date# where a.material_id=#material_id# and a.factory=#factory#
sqlMap.select:
select count( t.material_id) from basis_tb_productInfo t where 1=1
t.material_id=#material_id#
t.factory=#factory#

select aa.id,aa.quote_id,type_id,aa.currency_code, aa.project_name,aa.customer_id,aa.endCustomer_id, aa.isDelivery,aa.start_date,to_char(aa.start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') start_dateStr, aa.latest_expire,to_char(aa.latest_expire,'YYYY-MM-DD') latest_expireStr, aa.state,aa.remark,aa.cusGroup_id,aa.ecGroup_id, aa.create_time,aa.create_userId, aa.latest_time,aa.latest_userId,aa.org_code from basis.basis_tb_quoteInfo aa
where aa.state = 1

select aa.id,aa.quote_id,aa.main_id,aa.row_no,aa.material_id,aa.drNum,aa.qty, aa.target_resale,aa.target_cost,aa.amount,aa.reason,aa.competitor, aa.start_date,to_char(aa.start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') start_dateStr, aa.cus_remark,aa.suggest_resale,aa.suggest_cost,aa.state, aa.cus_profits_percent,aa.profits_percent,aa.remark from basis.basis_tb_quote_detail aa where aa.main_id=#id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.basis_tb_quote_detail aa set sync_state='1' where quoteId=#quoteId#
sqlMap.select:
select id, sale_group, distri_channel, PRODUCT_GROUPID product_group, type_id, ship_to, payer_to, billing_to, branch_id sale_to, currency_code, order_id, end_customer, project_name, contact_info from basis.BASIS_TB_ORDERINFO aa where 1=1
aa.id =#id#

select aa.id, row_no, material_id, order_QTY, sale_unit, aa.remark, delivery_date, to_char(delivery_date,'YYYYMMDD') delivery_dateStr, po_item
from basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa where aa.main_id=#id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa set id=#id#
sqlMap.select:
select id, sale_group, distri_channel, PRODUCT_GROUPID product_group, type_id, branch_id ship_to, branch_id payer_to, branch_id billing_to, branch_id sale_to, currency_code, order_id, end_customer, project_name, contact_info, aa.contact_name, aa.contact_tel, aa.city, aa.street, aa.country, aa.zip, aa.company from basis.BASIS_TB_ORDERINFO aa where 1=1
aa.id =#id#

select aa.id, row_no, material_id, order_QTY, sale_unit, aa.remark, delivery_date, to_char(delivery_date,'YYYYMMDD') delivery_dateStr
from basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa where aa.main_id=#id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa set id=#id#
sqlMap.select:
select ID, TRANSACTION_CODE, DISTI_NUM, DISTI_NAME, DISTI_BRANCH, DISTI_CITY, BOOK_PART, M_12NC, SHIP_DATE, QUOTE_SDATE, QUOTE_EDATE, SHIP_QTY, QUOTE_TOTALQTY, REBATE_QTY, DEBIT_NUMBER, DISTI_CLAIMNBR, OPPREG_NBR, CPN, DISTI_INVOICE_NBR, DISTI_INVOICE_ITEM_NUMBER, DISTI_COST, DISTI_COST_DENOM, DISTI_COST_CURRENCY, DISTI_COST_EXCHANGERATE, DISTI_BOOKCOST, DBC_DENOM, DBC_CURRENCY_CODE, DBC_EXCHANGE_RATE, DISTI_RESALE, DISTI_RESALE_DENOM, DISTI_RESALE_CURRENCY, DISTI_RESALE_EXCHANGE_RATE, PURCHASING_CUSTOMER_NAME, PURCHASING_CUST_COUNTRY, PURCHASING_CUST_STATE, PURCHASING_CUST_CITY, PURCHASING_CUST_ZIP, ENDCUST_NAME, ENDCUST_COUNTRY, ENDCUST_STATE, ENDCUST_CITY, ENDCUST_LOC, ENDCUST_ZIP, STATUS, DATA_FROM, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, TIPS from basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS aa where 1=1
aa.id =#id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS set sapClaimNbr=#sapClaimNbr#,status=4,REBATE_QTY=#remainQty#,row_no=#row_no#,update_time=sysdate where id=#id#
sqlMap.select:
select aa.id, row_no, material_id, order_QTY, sale_unit, aa.remark
from basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa where aa.main_id=#id#
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_ORDER_DETAIL aa set id=#id#
sqlMap.insert:
select basis.basis_seq_price_rule.nextval as id from dual
insert into basis.basis_tb_price_rule (id, PRICE_TYPE,REMARK,ORG_ID,material_id,customer_code,sale_price,currency_code,perUnit,unit,START_DATE,END_DATE,OFFICE_ID) values (#id#, #type#,#remark#,#salesOrg#,#materialNumber#,#customerNumber#,#price#,#ratioUnit#,#priceUnit#,#conditionUnit#,#startDate#,#endDate#,#officeId#)
sqlMap.update:
update basis_tb_price_rule a set a.PRICE_TYPE=#type#,a.REMARK=#remark#,a.ORG_ID=#salesOrg#,a.material_id=#materialNumber#,a.customer_code=#customerNumber# , a.sale_price=#price#,a.currency_code=#ratioUnit#,a.perUnit=#priceUnit#,a.unit=#conditionUnit#,a.START_DATE=#startDate#,a.END_DATE=#endDate#,a.office_id=#officeId# where 1=1
a.ORG_ID=#salesOrg#
a.PRICE_TYPE=#type#
a.START_DATE=#startDate#
a.END_DATE=#endDate#
a.customer_code=#customerNumber#
a.MATERIAL_ID=#materialNumber#
a.SALE_PRICE=#price#
a.office_id=#officeId#

delete from basis_tb_price_rule a where 1=1
.org_id=#org_id#
a.PRICE_TYPE=#type#
a.customer_code=#customerNumber#
a.MATERIAL_ID=#materialNumber#
a.office_id=#officeId#

delete from basis_tb_price_rule a where 1=1
a.PRICE_TYPE=#type#
round(to_number(sysdate - a.create_time) * 24) >= 10
sqlMap.select:
select count( t.id) from basis_tb_price_rule t where 1=1
t.org_id=#org_id#
t.PRICE_TYPE=#type#
t.customer_code=#customerNumber#
t.MATERIAL_ID=#materialNumber#
t.office_id=#officeId#

select id,disti_groupId,disti_customer_id,end_customer_groupId,end_customer_name, customer_type,customer_property,currency_code,country,province,address, contact_name,tel,state,audit_opinion,remark,end_customer_id from basis.basis_tb_end_customeInfo
where 1=1
id =#id#

select distinct pdl.kunnr,dl.promotion_id from crm.crm_tb_promotion_detail dl left join crm.crm_tb_customergroup_detail pdl on dl.customergroup_id = pdl.customergroup_id where dl.promotion_id=#promoId# and dl.state=1 and pdl.state=1
select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_productstock p where p.werks=#werks# and p.lgort=#lgort# and p.matnr=#matnr# and p.unit=#unit#
sqlMap.update: update crm.crm_tb_productstock p set p.werks=#werks#, p.lgort=#lgort#, p.unit=#unit#, p.stocknum=#stocknum#, p.modifydate=sysdate, p.stockkcjy=#stocknum#, p.bigmg=#bigmg#, p.bigme=#bigme# where p.werks=#werks# and p.lgort=#lgort# and p.matnr=#matnr# and p.unit=#unit#
sqlMap.insert:
select CRM.CRM_SQ_NOCLEAR_ACCOUNT.NEXTVAL as id from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_noclear_account ( id, bukrs, gjahr, belnr, buzei, hkont, budat, zuonr, dmbtr, remark) values (#id#,#bukrs#,#gjahr#,#belnr#,#buzei#,#hkont#,#budat#,#zuonr#,#dmbtr#,#remark#)
sqlMap.update: update crm.crm_tb_noclear_account p set bukrs=#bukrs#, gjahr=#gjahr#, belnr=#belnr#, buzei=#buzei#, hkont=#hkont#, budat=#budat#, zuonr=#zuonr#, dmbtr=#dmbtr#, remark=#remark# where bukrs=#bukrs# and gjahr=#gjahr# and belnr=#belnr# and buzei=#buzei# and hkont=#hkont# and zuonr=#zuonr#
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_noclear_account p where 1=1 and bukrs=#bukrs# and gjahr=#gjahr# and belnr=#belnr# and buzei=#buzei# and hkont=#hkont# and zuonr=#zuonr#

select id as id, bukrs as bukrs, gjahr as gjahr, belnr as belnr, buzei as buzei, hkont as hkont, budat as budat, zuonr as zuonr, dmbtr as dmbtr, remark as remark from crm.crm_tb_noclear_account where bukrs=#pbukrs#
gjahr=#gjahr#

select id as id, bukrs as bukrs, gjahr as gjahr, belnr as belnr, buzei as buzei, hkont as hkont, budat as budat, zuonr as zuonr, dmbtr as dmbtr , remark from crm.crm_tb_noclear_account where belnr=#belnr#
select count(1) from crm.crm_tb_receivepay where receiveId = #receiveId# and sale_company = #saleCompany# and account_year = #accountYear# and buzei = #buzei#
sqlMap.insert:
select crm.crm_sq_receivepay.nextval as id from dual
insert into crm.crm_tb_receivepay ( ID, KUNNR, SALE_COMPANY, ACCOUNT_YEAR, RECEIVE_MONEY, RECEIVE_DATE, SKPZ, RECEIVEID, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE, MODIFYUSER, MODIFYDATE, STATUS, SY_MONEY, REMARK, BUZEI, SP ) values (#id#,#kunnr#,#saleCompany#,#accountYear#,#receiveMoney#, #receiveDate#,#skpz#,#receiveId#,#createUser#,#createDate#, #modifyUser#,#modifyDate#,#status#,#syMoney#,#remark#,#buzei#,#sp#)
sqlMap.update: update crm.crm_tb_credit aa set aa.credit_useamount=(select sum(sy_money) from crm.crm_tb_receivepay where kunnr=#kunnrId#) where kunnr=#kunnrId# and credit_range='1020'
sqlMap.select: select distinct skpz from crm.crm_tb_receivePay where status != 3
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_ORDERINFO set sap_order_id=#sap_order_id#,sync_state=1 where id=#id#
update basis.BASIS_TB_ORDERINFO set sap_order_id=#sap_order_id#,sync_state=1 where id=#id#
update basis.BASIS_TB_QUOTEINFO set sync_state=1 where id=#id#
update basis.basis_tb_end_customeInfo set sync_state=1 where id=#id#
update basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS set DISTI_CLAIMNBR=#disti_claimnbr#,status=1,REBATE_QTY=#rebate_qty# where debit_number=#debit_number#
update basis.basis_tb_quote_detail set res_qty = #res_qty# where quote_id=#debit_number# and material_name=#book_part#
sqlMap.select: select sold_to ,ship_to , bill_to billing_to,payer_to from basis.BASIS_TB_DISTI_BRANCH where payer_to = #disti_branch# and rownum = 1
select id,sapClaimNbr,claim_deal_mark from basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS where id= #id# and rownum = 1
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS set claim_deal_mark = #claim_deal_mark# where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id,type from basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS_MN where id= #id# and type= #type#
sqlMap.update: update basis.BASIS_TB_CUS_POS_MN set type = #type# where id=#id#
